turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to order a Starbucks coffee for pickup, please, at at the Wallingford location, Wallingford, Connecticut.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get a ice, white chocolate mocha grande with 2% milk and whipped cream?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size would you like that in?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering a grande iced white chocolate mocha with 2% and whipped cream to be picked up in wallingford, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep, the location in North Colony Road.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great i'll send to that location, your drink will be ready in 5 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.
